title: Python for Beginners
description: Learn Python from scratch, covering basic syntax, data structures, and foundational programming concepts. Perfect for those new to coding.

instructor.name: Sarah Johnson
instructor.title: Data Scientist & Python Developer
instructor.bio: Sarah has over 10 years of experience in Python programming and has worked at top tech companies.

modules.title: Introduction to Python
modules.description: Understand Python basics and setup your environment

whatYouWillLearn: Work with data types and structures

title: Web Development with HTML & CSS
description: Master HTML and CSS to create stunning, responsive websites. Learn how to structure web pages and apply styles.

instructor.name: David Lee
instructor.title: Front-End Developer
instructor.bio: David specializes in front-end technologies and has worked with various startups to build stunning websites.

modules.title: HTML Basics
modules.description: Learn the foundation of web pages with HTML.

title: React.js for Frontend Developers
description: Learn how to build modern web applications using React.js. Covers components, state management, and hooks.

instructor.name: Michael Roberts
instructor.title: Full-Stack Developer
instructor.bio: Michael has extensive experience in building scalable applications using React and Node.js.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Dive into machine learning concepts, algorithms, and real-world applications using Python.

instructor.name: Alice Kim
instructor.title: AI Engineer
instructor.bio: Alice has worked on AI projects in the healthcare and finance sectors, bringing real-world expertise to the course.

modules.title: Machine Learning Basics
modules.description: Learn core ML concepts and algorithms.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Learn the fundamentals of cybersecurity, including threat detection, network security, and encryption techniques.

instructor.name: Emily Carter
instructor.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
instructor.bio: Emily has over a decade of experience in cybersecurity, specializing in ethical hacking and data protection.

modules.title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
modules.description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity and common threats.

title: Data Science with R
description: Explore data science concepts, visualization techniques, and predictive modeling using the R programming language.

instructor.name: Robert Simmons
instructor.title: Data Scientist
instructor.bio: Robert has worked on large-scale data projects and is passionate about teaching data science with R.

modules.title: Introduction to R for Data Science
modules.description: Learn the basics of R and data manipulation.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Master the fundamentals of cloud computing and learn how to deploy applications using Amazon Web Services (AWS).

instructor.name: James Nguyen
instructor.title: Cloud Architect
instructor.bio: James has extensive experience in cloud solutions and has worked with multiple Fortune 500 companies.

modules.title: AWS Fundamentals
modules.description: Introduction to AWS services and cloud infrastructure.

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Learn how to create 2D and 3D games using the Unity engine. Covers game physics, animations, and scripting.

instructor.name: Sophia Martinez
instructor.title: Game Developer
instructor.bio: Sophia has developed several indie games and teaches game design and development.

modules.title: Getting Started with Unity
modules.description: Introduction to Unity’s interface and features.

lessons.title: Installing Unity and Setting Up Your First Project

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Learn how to create user-friendly and performant apps.

instructor.name: Daniel Wilson
instructor.title: Mobile App Developer
instructor.bio: Daniel has worked on several successful mobile applications and specializes in Flutter development.

modules.title: Introduction to Flutter
modules.description: Learn the basics of Flutter and Dart programming.
